title: Crockpot Parmesan Chicken
ingredients: ¼ cup grated parmesan plus 2 tbsp
directions: The night before, prepare marinade by whisking together 3 tablespoons olive oil, ¼ cup cheese, basil, parsley, garlic, salt, pepper, and 3 tablespoons of wine in a bowl. Place chicken in a large container, then pour marinade over top and coat chicken. Keep in the fridge overnight. /p The next morning, place chicken in crockpot with 3 tablespoons of wine. Cook on low for 6-8 hours. /p Prepare couscous/quinoa according to package directions and steam vegetables of choice. Once couscous/quinoa is cooked, combine with remaining olive oil, parmesan and salt and pepper if desired. /p Cut chicken into pieces/chunks, and toss together with grain and vegetables. Top with additional two tablespoons of parmesan. /p Serving size: ¼ of total yield /p Calories 318/serving
